SoftSkills.heading: Soft Skills.
SoftSkills.subheading: Not everything it's about code, soft skills are important too.

s1.name: Problem Solving
s1.description: Ability to analyze issues and find effective solutions.

s2.name: Critical Thinking
s2.description: Capacity to evaluate information objectively to make informed decisions.

s3.name: Effective Communication
s3.description: Clearly conveying ideas and collaborating with others.

s4.name: Teamwork
s4.description: Working effectively with other team members to achieve common goals.

s5.name: Time Management
s5.description: Organizing and planning time efficiently to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines.

s6.name: Leadership
s6.description: Guiding and motivating teams to achieve goals and their best performance.

s7.name: Creativity
s7.description: Thinking outside the box to develop innovative ideas and/or solutions.

s8.name: Responsibility
s8.description: Demonstrating dedication and being reliable in all tasks.

s9.name: Punctuality
s9.description: Consistently being on time for meetings, deadlines, and commitments.

s10.name: Perseverance
s10.description: Staying determined and persistent in the face of challenges and setbacks. Maintaining effort and determination despite challenges and setbacks. Maintaining effort and persistence and staying determined and motivated despite challenges and setbacks.

s11.name: Professionalism
s11.description: Maintaining a high standard of conduct, appearance, and work quality and ethic in the workplace.

s12.name: Adaptability
s12.description: Adjusting to new changes, situations and environments with ease.

s13.name: Emotional Intelligence
s13.description: Understanding and managing your own emotions, as well as empathizing with others. Understanding and managing emotions for better interpersonal relationships.

s14.name: Conflict Resolution
s14.description: Effectively managing and resolving disagreements and finding mutually beneficial solutions. Effectively managing and resolving disagreements.

s15.name: Work Ethic
s15.description: Demonstrating dedication and reliability in all tasks.

s16.name: Empathy
s16.description: Ability to understand and share the feelings of others.

s17.name: Work Under Pressure
s17.description: Maintaining calm and efficiency in high-pressure situations and tight deadlines.

HobbiesAndInterests.heading: Hobbies & Interests

h1.name: Coding

h3.name: Traveling

h6.name: Gaming

Projects.heading: Beyond skills.
Projects.subheading: Here's some of my best projects yet where I applied my skills.

p1.title: Food bank system
p1.description: • Improved manual processes by building a modern and robust system. Designed both mobile and web application mockups in Figma. Developed the frontend of the web application using React.js and CSS.

p2.title: Wizeprompt
p2.description: • Designed and developed an intuitive and easy to use internal platform for employee developers to access AI-powered conversations.

p3.title: Meeting rooms app
p3.description: • Designed and developed a full stack web application to facilitate meeting scheduling using MongoDB, Express.js, Node.js and React.js (MERN stack).

p4.title: myCover App
p4.description: • Designed and developed an intuitive mobile application using Apple technologies to easily create, share and save unique, personalized digital tickets for any social event directly to the pre-installed Apple 'Wallet' app.

p5.title: Data analytics dashboard
p5.description: • Analyzed and cleaned a provided database to integrate and display the data models in charts through an user-friendly web interface.

p6.title: Puzzle videogame
p6.description: • Created a puzzle video game using the Unity game engine and metaverse technologies to improve ADHD, and designed and developed a web interface to manage user video game statistics.

p7.title: Kanbanize Lite
p7.description: • Created a puzzle video game using the Unity game engine and metaverse technologies to improve ADHD, and designed and developed a web interface to manage user video game statistics.

p8.title: Weather App
p8.description: A web application that provides real-time weather information using OpenWeatherMap API and React.js.

p9.title: Chat Application
p9.description: A real-time chat application with user authentication and group chat features using Socket.io and Node.js.

p10.title: Task Manager App
p10.description: A web application to manage tasks and to-dos with user authentication using MERN stack.

p11.title: Portfolio Website
p11.description: A personal portfolio website to showcase my skills, projects, and experiences using React and Vite.

p12.title: E-commerce App
p12.description: A full-stack e-commerce application with user authentication, product management, and payment integration using MERN stack. A full-featured e-commerce website with product listings, shopping cart, and payment integration using MERN stack.

p13.title: Mobile Fitness Tracker
p13.description: A mobile app to track fitness activities, set goals, and monitor progress using React Native.

p14.title: Data Analysis Dashboard
p14.description: An interactive dashboard for visualizing and analyzing datasets using Python, Pandas, and Plotly.

p15.title: Personal Blog
p15.description: A personal blog website built with Gatsby.js and GraphQL to share articles and tutorials on web development.

p16.title: Personal Finance Tracker
p16.description: A web application to track personal expenses and income using React.js and Node.js.

p17.title: Personal Budget App
p17.description: A mobile application to track personal expenses and income using React Native and Expo.

SocialProof.heading: Social Proof
SocialProof.subheading: Here are some testimonials from my colleagues and clients.

p1.name: Misael Delgado
p1.comment: His technical skills in data analysis, statistical modeling, and programming languages such as Python and SQL are truly commendable.

p2.name: John Doe
p2.comment: Working with Elvis has been a pleasure. He is a team player who communicates effectively and contributes valuable ideas. Elvis consistently delivers high-quality work on time. His problem-solving skills and attention to detail are exceptional. Elvis exceeded our expectations with his innovative approach and dedication to our project. Highly recommended!
